body:
I guess I'm just one of those guys who can't seem to like it when shotas look like girls, wear girl clothing etc.
Like what's the point of them being a shota if they look like girls?

Oh kinda good, the art style reminds me of those old doujinshis I used to read when I was younger. @Lil'Lolicon-san just admit that u like feminine boys, that isn't gonna make u less of a man and @Emiru Ikuno in my country is supposedly "ilegal" but it's fairly common hearing in the news about cases about human trafficking, sexual exploitation, kidnapping, etc
I WAS WAITING FOR THIS FOR A LONG TIME...... CASTRATED TRAP = BEST FUCKING ARTIST EVER
nah you can't cut his balls off that's the bes tpart

I means, yeah in these kind of "settings" I guess it's perfectly for it, the "tomgirl shota" combo where it's indeed a young girl, loli, but for "reasons" that using the Female would be... idk, tickles their 2D moral? *heh* The Authors would just put on a pair of Phimosis dick & balls and problems solved. / @Emiru Ikuno define "legal". If it's in my mind, my thought only and it's still somehow "illegal" then fuck the Laws.

Thank you mysterymeat for translating more of menoko's old works. Bless your soul menoko for being consistently great at writing gay mangas. This was quite cute. I am not the biggest fan of shota but if it's a yaoi shota then inject more of those in my veins please. I like this one. It's really cool that we get to see more of menoko's old works and I do hope we get to see more of it. (Also can we please get more of komezawa's works or morino bambi's mako hentais?)
6/10 a cute fappable hentai with shotas and it's recommend to those who likes anal sex well gay anal sex that is
A universe where human trafficking is legal
